github.copilot.chat.pullRequestDescripti.text: Always generate a structured pull request description using the following sections: Summary, Key Changes, Motivation, Testing, and Additional Notes.
Always format Key Changes as a bullet list with at least 3-6 specific items.
Always write in a professional, concise, engineering-focused tone. Avoid marketing language such as 'robust', 'seamless', 'enhanced', or 'improved'.
Always explain why the change was made, not just what changed.
Always include testing instructions describing how reviewers can verify the changes.
Never collapse the entire description into a single paragraph.
